articles.author: Rebecca Bellan
articles.title: Perplexity’s Comet AI browser now free; Max users get new ‘background assistant’ - TechCrunch
articles.description: AI search startup Perplexity is making its new Comet browser available to everyone in the world for free as it works to position the product against big browsers and search engines. For certain paid subscribers, the startup has also launched a new ‘background…
